item.title: dashfacts.com
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded:
[button link="sign-up" size="medium" color="orange" target="self"]Sign Up for FREE[/button]  Better, faster, smarter customer marketing is just a few clicks away.  Signup with dashfacts.com and get your FREE account up an running in just a few minutes. [divider/] [one_third]

Sell More Successfully

dashfacts.com delivers actionable recommendations based on rigorous analytics to help you sell more successfully and win more business. More About Selling [/one_third] [one_third]

Control Your Business

dashfacts.com puts vital information in a dashboard at your fingertips every day so you control your business, not the other way around. More on Control [/one_third] [one_third_last]

Get Answers Fast

dashfacts.com serves up answers when you need them through our interactive reporting and data visualization tools so you can SEE the answers. More on Insights [/one_third_last] [divider_top/]

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded: Wanna sign-up? Thinking your transaction data is hiding something from you?  Feeling overwhelmed and need to put some organization and direction around your data?  We can help!  dashfacts.com is built for merchants by merchants and we can bring the power of data mining and advanced analytics to your doorstep without you having to get out of your pj's.  Sign-up for one of our FREE accounts and see Need some help on a report? If you have a question about a report, analysis or something you see in your data, you want to contact our marketing masters at intelligence@dashfacts.com.  Our intelligence team is well equipped to answer questions from "what is the source of this data?" to how did you forecast my sales so accurately?  Whether they are questions on data, analysis, statistics or recommended actions, we are here to help!  You can contact our marketing masters by email at intelligence@dashfact.som or open up a live chat window and select "Intelligence" to reach the right person! Wanna change your account? Are you using our FREE service and want to find out what you're missing?  It's easy to upgrade your account, you can do so at http://account.dashfacts.com and Select, Manage My Account.  Of course, we are absolutely delighted to help you as well.  Open up a chat, drop us an email, or give us a call and we'll take care of you right away! Got a question? Trying to figure out what to do?  Need a little more information?  Contact dashfacts.com, we would love to hear from you!  E-mail us at service@dashfacts.com Wanna write a cool story about dashfacts.com? We're good with that!  If you're a member of the media and you want to get the low-down on dashfacts.com and what we are trying to do, give us a shout at media@dashfacts.com.  We'll put together a press-kit for you and give you some insights on what we are up to!

Need some help with a report? A dashboard? An analysis? A recommendation? Data source? We've got you covered - you need to talk with our marketing masters. We can help you understand the in's and out's of your data and our reporting to help you accelerate your growth. We have lots of ways to help:

Intelligence Base - checkout our on-line tools to help you navigate reports and dashboards.  Sometimes, a quick primer video is just the trick to get a quick answer to your question.  Click on the Intelligence Base link to get you going.

Live Chat - we are on stand-by to answer your questions from 8 AM EST to 8 PM EST.  Be sure to select "Intelligence" to route your question to the marketing masters.  Chat not running?  You can leave a message through our chat system and we will hop right on it the next day!

e-Mail -  need a bit of a longer explanation?  maybe some additional data?  want to share your report back with us?  you can always send us an e-mail at intelligence@dashfacts.com or you can open up a support ticket at our fancy-shmancy Support Desk.  

Toll-Free - want to reach out and touch us?  Feel free to do so, you can reach our marketing masters at 888.888.8888 and choose Option 2 on the support menu.  If we are on the phone booking our vacation to the bahamas, feel free to leave a message and we'll call you back from the office or a sandy beach!

I am the CEO and CMO of dashfacts.com.  That's a lot of "C's" and I thought I was a better student than that!  I have worked in marketing circles for the better part of 20 years in small businesses, large businesses and everything in between.  

I started dashfacts.com with Matt because my small retail business had no access to tools that I have been using my entire career to support major retail companies.  There had to be a better way to get customer driven information on my business instead of transaction data spit back at me from my shopping cart.  

Our goal here is simple, we promise to make customer marketing accessible, affordable and invaluable to your business.  Give us a go, and don't forget to drop us a line every now and then and let us know how we are doing.

item.title: Customer Reporting
item.dc:creator: cedaly

item.title: Database Marketing
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded:
Database marketing is the tool you need that you often don’t know how to name; simply put, database marketing is looking at your data from a customer perspective to identify ways to grow your business more profitably. At dashfacts.com, we are all about database marketing and our core service provides a rock solid foundation for you to understand the “who” in your business. Our services include:
Extraction, Transformation and Loading (ETL) – pulling data from your systems and transforming it to enable customer marketing
Data Cleansing – we have tools to recognize that Christopher Daly, Chris E. Daly and Chris Daly living at the same address are actually the same person so you don’t inundate your customers with marketing messages.
Segmentation – we segment your file using a variety of methods to help you isolate customers that deliver higher sales from those that don’t so you can focus your marketing dollars appropriately.
Enhancement – believe it or not, your customers exist off-line and some of their off-line information is key to understanding their on-line behavior. We enhance customer records to give you insight into who the customer actually is.
Campaign Reporting – the life-blood of good marketing database is writing back the results of your marketing campaigns. We will help you to discover what worked, what did not, and how to get better.
If you're working in e-commerce, the foundation of your marketing is database marketing. If your marketing database is your e-commerce store database, it's time for you to explore dashfacts.com and discover the power of customer marketing.

item.title: Business Intelligence
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded:
At dashfacts.com Business Intelligence goes beyond operational reporting, we interweave your customers into your operational data. You will learn how customers leverage promotions like Free Shipping and what that impact is on your business transactionally.
We also pull in data from multiple sources including Google Analytics, UPS and Federal Express so that we can overlay operational data with customer behaviors and paint a clear picture of how customers are impacting your business. Business Intelligence isn’t a reporting tool, it’s how you transform your data into actionable information. We’re good at that. In fact, we’re experts at that. We deliver the facts, it’s up to you to take the action.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: dashfacts.com Business Intelligence is Your Business via Your Customer
dashfacts.com Business Intelligence provides reporting on your business operations through the perspective of your customer. Real. Insight.

item.title: Analytics to Action
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded:
At dashfacts.com, we use statistical techniques to identify patterns in your data that you may not be able to detect.
Did your eyes roll into the back of your head when we said “statistics?” No sweat, we simplify statistical analysis by using English – we describe outcomes in terms you will understand and we give you direction on what the analytics are telling you to do.
Need an example? dashfacts.com might deliver a pricing analysis that indicates a percentage of your customers don’t need the heavy discounts you have been giving them in order to transact, they need something else. By deploying the analytics, you can save yourself thousands of dollars in discounts that can be used to buy new merchandise, acquire new customers, or maybe get you to a nice warm beach for a few days. No worries – with dashfacts.com, you can take your executive dashboard with you even to the beach.
See more examples of how dashfacts.com advanced analytics translate into action!

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: dashfacts.com Database Marketing Advanced Analytics to Action
dashfacts.com's statistical analyses uncover patterns in data, we explain what they mean and how to use them in actionable business terms.

item.title: Executive Dashboarding
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded: When you own a small business like we do, sometimes it feels like the business is running you. Executive dashboards help you get a quick glimpse on the health of your business, spot upward or downward trends so you can take action and help you gain control over your daily routine. At dashfacts.com, we design dashboards that help you measure the most important components to your business, both customer facing and transactional, so you can stay on top of everything. Oh, did we forget to mention our dashboards are in HTML5 so you are going to get crisp clean, interactive analytics and they are responsive so easily viewed on your tablet or phone. Dashboarding is a key to keeping your business under control, it’s what we are all about.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: How Basic Segmentation Can Make You More Money
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded:
Segmentation is actually a really simple process and one we deliver to you as part of your dashfacts.com experience. Segmentation is something we do every day from sorting our laundry (darks, lights, dry-clean, non-dryclean) to picking a place to eat for dinner (food type, pace of delivery, price range, etc.). The most simple form of segmentation is buyer, non-buyer. What you will see in dashfacts.com is a variety of techniques and they each have a purpose to help you grow your business. Today we will focus on a segmentation technique we call RFM(X).
RFM stands for Recency, Monetary and Frequency. These three variables have been used in database marketing for over 100 years. Simply put, Recency is commonly used as a proxy for satisfaction. If a customer was not satisfied, they would not be shopping with you. Frequency is often looked at as a measure of loyalty, the more often a customer shops with you, the stronger the indication that they like your brand. Finally, Monetary is a measure of discretionary income. Customers who spend more money with you tend to show that they have a higher propensity to spend. So what's the (X) stand for? What you think it stands for, the X-factor indicator to your business that a customer is a great customer. The X could be the number of visits they make to your site, the number of unique page views, the number of times they have asked questions about a product, just about anything you feel is indicative of a good customer.
At dashfacts.com, our RFM segmentation is simple, our algorithms identify three natural breaks in the range of values for each variable, apply that score to the customer record and voila, you have your first RFM segmentation containing 27 different segments (3x3x3). At the top of the segmentation is your most valuable customers that you want to retain and even encourage them to help bring new customers to your business. At the bottom are customers that need nurturing and possibly heavy discounts to get them to add more value.
So how does basic segmentation save you money? Simple, using RFM segments, you can determine if you are unnecessarily applying large discounts to customers who would buy anyway and you could shift those discount dollars to customers who need more incentive to purchase. You could also see how to improve the shopping cart by building promotions that encourage top customers to add one more item to their cart before checkout.
Simple segmentation is only the beginning of your dashfacts.com experience. Stay tuned for our webinars on marketing segmentation and how to build a more durable, profitable customer base.

item.title: Volusion
item.dc:creator: cedaly
item.content:encoded: dashfacts.com is now integrated with Volusion. Add the dashfacts.com Volusion app to your cart, create your account on dashfacts.com and better, faster, smarter marketing is on the way.
